item.description:
If Dad wishes to hike this Father's Day, this is a great trail for a big or little hike, depending on how far you would like to hike.

This hike features the open views of Crawford Path, Mt Pierce and Mt Eisenhower which offer 360 degree views of the Whites. Don't forget to bring a little extra lunch for the Canadian greyjays on Mt Pierce.

Weather permitting, some of us will waiting for you at the Mitpah Hut 2.5 miles from the trailhead after camping Saturday night. Will we chill or hike after a night in our tents? As long as everyone has a good time, the goal is Dad's choice!



Totals
Distance 9.00 mi to Mt Eisenhower and return to trailhead.
Time 7 hr 42 min
Elev Gain +3548 ft
Elev Loss -3548 ft
Elev Change 0 ft



We would like to see at least 3 "yes" RSVP's to create a meetup. Your assistance on the trail is always welcome and helps in making a Meetup

Please keep your rsvp's up to date. Its very important that we
have a true headcount, and not worry that your late or lost.

Every hiker is important on a hike, especially if we divide the
hike into a fast and slow group, or if there is an injury. Review the trail maps and itinerary available in the White Mountain Guidebook.

This group will average a 1pm turn around time. If trail or hiker conditions slow the group, you need to understand that the goal for the day can change and we must start back to end the hike safely.

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHM disclaimer.

Make sure your hiker profile is complete so we can verify that your qualified to join us on this White Mountain hike.

Carpooling is always advised and a great way to get to know your fellow members.
item.how_to_find_us: parking lot. Divide the large group into 10's & stay on trail
item.name: Hike Eisenhower and Pierce via Crawford path
